refund.title: Request refund
refund.subtitle: You can request a refund within the time period stipulated by the producer.
refund.verificationSubtitle: To confirm this operation, enter the code we sent to your email
refund.refundMessage: By requesting a refund, your purchase will be cancelled and you will lose access to the product.
refund.purchasesSubtitle: Select the product to request refund
refund.refundRequestedMessage: You will receive an email with the status of your refund. Check your SPAM folder.
refund.refundSelectFirst: I haven't been able to access the product yet, but I would like to
refund.refundSelectSecond: I need the money for other things
refund.refundSelectThird: I received access, but pages or files do not open
refund.refundSelectFourth: The quality of the product did not meet my expectations
refund.refundMessageOptional: Would you like to provide any further information?
